text: Source Lake is a small lake in geographic Canisbay and Peck townships in the Unorganized South part of Nipissing District in Northeastern Ontario, Canada. It lies in southern Algonquin Provincial Park and is part of the Saint Lawrence River drainage basin. The river is the source of the Madawaska River, which flows via the Ottawa River to the Saint Lawrence River. Camp Pathfinder, a boys' summer camp, is located on Source Lake. ==See also== *List of lakes in Ontario == References == Other map sources: * * * Category:Lakes of Nipissing District
title: Source Lake (Nipissing District)
